description: From the pronunciation of y /waɪ/ + t for /t/ respective /tiː/.

entries.meaning: (slang, African-American Vernacular, sometimes derogatory) Alternative spelling of white (“Caucasian”)
examples: People of color aspire to be light skinned and yt people aspire to be tan. It is only aesthetically pleasing for yt people to be brown.

entries.meaning: (uncommon, slang, African-American Vernacular, derogatory) Alternative spelling of whitey

description: Abbreviation of þat (“that”), with y taking the place of the old letter thorn (þ), as in ye for þe (“the”).
